name: Kyros
description: Kyros is a liquid restaking protocol on Solana that maximizes the utility of staked assets by combining staking, MEV, and restaking rewards into a single liquid token. It allows users to earn uncapped yield without sacrificing liquidity, while enabling other services to leverage Solanaâ€™s security through Node Consensus Networks. The protocol is designed for composability, capital efficiency, and broad DeFi integration.
